<SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Functions

### fixupLoopInstrs() {#a40ca1821d0be81473a93800b4f59028f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool HexagonFixupHwLoops::fixupLoopInstrs (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF)</>}>
Check the offset between each loop instruction and the loop basic block to determine if we can use the LOOP instruction or if we need to set the LC/SA registers explicitly.

For <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hexagon">Hexagon</a>, if the loop label is to far from the loop instruction then we need to set the LC0 and SA0 registers explicitly instead of using LOOP(start,count).

This function checks the distance, and generates register assignments if needed.

This function makes two passes over the basic blocks. The first pass computes the offset of the basic block from the start. The second pass checks all the loop instructions.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonfixuphwloops-cpp/#l00065">65</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonfixuphwloops-cpp">HexagonFixupHwLoops.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### useExtLoopInstr() {#a60c92fdfc0fec1b76ed2ef33393816a2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void HexagonFixupHwLoops::useExtLoopInstr (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> &amp; MII)</>}>
Replace loop instruction with the constant extended version if the loop label is too far from the loop instruction.

Replace loop instructions with the constant extended version.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonfixuphwloops-cpp/#l00069">69</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonfixuphwloops-cpp">HexagonFixupHwLoops.cpp</a>.
